bill.title: Air Carrier Worker Support Extension Act of 2020
bill.description: To provide support for air carrier workers, and for other purposes.

history.action: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

subjects.subject_name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
